meta.name: Transform Blog Posts to Multi-Platform Content with GPT-4o, Unsplash and Airtable

parameters.content:
## ü§ñ AI Content Repurposing Engine

### üìã Setup Instructions

**Step 1: Configure RSS Feed**
1. Open "New Blog Post" trigger
2. Replace `https://yourblog.com/feed` with your RSS URL
   ‚Ä¢ Common: `/feed`, `/rss`, `/feed.xml`
3. Test in browser to verify XML loads

**Step 2: Configure Integrations**
üîπ **Slack Channel**
   ‚Ä¢ Right-click channel ‚Üí View details ‚Üí Copy Channel ID
   ‚Ä¢ Replace `REPLACE_WITH_SLACK_CONTENT_CHANNEL_ID`

üîπ **Airtable Setup**
   ‚Ä¢ Base ID: Copy from URL ‚Üí `appXXXXXXXXXXXXXX`
   ‚Ä¢ Table ID: Copy from URL ‚Üí `tblYYYYYYYYYYYY`
   ‚Ä¢ Create columns: Original_Title, Original_URL, Published_Date, LinkedIn_Post, LinkedIn_Hashtags, Twitter_Thread, Twitter_Hashtags, Instagram_Caption, Instagram_Hashtags, Email_Subject, Email_Body, Video_Script, Suggested_Images, Status

**Step 3: Add Credentials**
‚úì OpenAI (GPT-4o)
‚úì Unsplash API
‚úì Slack OAuth2
‚úì Airtable Token

**Step 4: Optional Auto-Posting**
üîπ **LinkedIn** (disabled by default)
   ‚Ä¢ Enable "Post to LinkedIn" node
   ‚Ä¢ Organization ID: linkedin.com/company/YOUR-ORG ‚Üí Copy from URL
   ‚Ä¢ Replace `REPLACE_WITH_LINKEDIN_ORG_ID`

üîπ **Twitter** (disabled by default)
   ‚Ä¢ Enable "Post to Twitter" node
   ‚Ä¢ Add Twitter OAuth2 credential

---

### ‚öôÔ∏è How It Works
**RSS** ‚Üí **Extract** ‚Üí **AI Repurpose** ‚Üí **Images** ‚Üí **Slack** ‚Üí **Airtable** ‚Üí **Auto-Post**
‚Ä¢ LinkedIn: 1300 chars, professional
‚Ä¢ Twitter: 4-tweet thread
‚Ä¢ Instagram: Storytelling format
‚Ä¢ Email: Newsletter snippet
‚Ä¢ Video: TikTok/Shorts script
